title: Experiential Learning in Economics Through Photography: Applying Kolb’s Learning Cycle for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Economics Concepts and Proficiency in Operating Digital Cameras/Smartphones
context.additional_context: Course for pre-service teachers to understand economic concepts through visual materials and hands-on activities, exploring pedagogical methods applicable to educational settings.

learning_goals: Learners can apply Kolb’s learning cycle to document and analyze economic phenomena through photography.
Learners can connect economic theories to real-life examples and explain them through photo essays.
Learners can conduct peer evaluations using digital platforms, improve photographic materials by incorporating feedback.
Learners can develop creative approaches to interpret economic issues from multiple perspectives while planning a photo exhibition.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
